snippet.title: Helldivers 2 - Escalation of Freedom Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PC Games
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-gb/games/helldivers-2/

Coming August 6th 2024. Escalation of Freedom is the first major update for HELLDIVERS 2. Get ready to take on the new "Super-Helldive" CR10 difficulty, deadly new enemies, new mission types and much more. 

The Galactic War rages on and Super Earth needs you to take arms and dive back into the fight for liberty and managed democracy!

HELLDIVERS 2 is Out Now for PS5 and PC 

#ps5 #ps5games #pcgames #helldivers2 

Rated Mature
